  16. open Misc

  18. ‌type pers_flags =
  19.   | Rectypes
  20.   | Alerts of alerts
  21.   | Opaque

  23. ‌type error =
  24.   | Not_an_interface of filepath
  25.   | Wrong_version_interface of filepath * string
  26.   | Corrupted_interface of filepath

  28. exception Error of error

  30. (* these type abbreviations are not exported;
  31.    they are used to provide consistency across
  32.    input_value and output_value usage. *)
  33. ‌type signature = Types.signature_item list
  34. ‌type flags = pers_flags list
  35. ‌type header = modname * signature

  37. ‌type cmi_infos = {
  38.     cmi_name : modname;
  39.     cmi_sign : signature;
  40.     cmi_crcs : crcs;
  41.     cmi_flags : flags;
  42. }

  44. ‌let input_cmi ic =
  45.   let (name, sign) = (input_value ic : header) in
  46.   let crcs = (input_value ic : crcs) in
  47.   let flags = (input_value ic : flags) in
  48.   {
  49.       cmi_name = name;
  50.       cmi_sign = sign;
  51.       cmi_crcs = crcs;
  52.       cmi_flags = flags;
  53.     }

  55. ‌let read_cmi filename =
  56.   let ic = open_in_bin filename in
  57.   try
  58.     let buffer =
  59.       really_input_string ic (String.length Config.cmi_magic_number)
  60.     in
  61.     if buffer <> Config.cmi_magic_number then begin
  62.       close_in ic;
  63.       let pre_len = String.length Config.cmi_magic_number - 3 in
  64.       if String.sub buffer 0 pre_len
  65.           = String.sub Config.cmi_magic_number 0 pre_len then
  66.       begin
  67.         let msg =
  68.           if buffer < Config.cmi_magic_number then "an older" else "a newer" in
  69.         raise (Error (Wrong_version_interface (filename, msg)))
  70.       end else begin
  71.         raise(Error(Not_an_interface filename))
  72.       end
  73.     end;
  74. ‌    let cmi = input_cmi ic in
  75.     close_in ic;
  76.     cmi
  77.   with End_of_file | Failure _ ->
  78.       close_in ic;
  79.       raise(Error(Corrupted_interface(filename)))
  80.     | Error e ->
  81.       close_in ic;
  82.       raise (Error e)

  84. ‌let output_cmi filename oc cmi =
  85. (* beware: the provided signature must have been substituted for saving *)
  86.   output_string oc Config.cmi_magic_number;
  87.   Marshal.(to_channel oc ((cmi.cmi_name, cmi.cmi_sign) : header) [Compression]);
  88.   flush oc;
  89.   let crc = Digest.file filename in
  90.   let crcs = (cmi.cmi_name, Some crc) :: cmi.cmi_crcs in
  91.   output_value oc (crcs : crcs);
  92.   output_value oc (cmi.cmi_flags : flags);
  93.   crc

  95. (* Error report *)

  97. open Format

  99. ‌let report_error ppf = function
  100.   | Not_an_interface filename ->
  101.       fprintf ppf "%a@ is not a compiled interface"
  102.         Location.print_filename filename
  103.   | Wrong_version_interface (filename, older_newer) ->
  104.       fprintf ppf
  105.         "%a@ is not a compiled interface for this version of OCaml.@.\
  106.          It seems to be for %s version of OCaml."
  107.         Location.print_filename filename older_newer
  108.   | Corrupted_interface filename ->
  109.       fprintf ppf "Corrupted compiled interface@ %a"
  110.         Location.print_filename filename

  112. let () =
  113.   Location.register_error_of_exn
  114.     (function
  115.       | Error err -> Some (Location.error_of_printer_file report_error err)
  116.       | _ -> None
  117.     )
